items.content:
This is what a +10.85% day in #silver #futures looks like on a 5-minute chart: look at the slam just before #Comex ghost pit hours, the C&R on the $74.5 stops, and the powerful continuation into the close. 

Save it for your grandkids. 
Tell them you saw it live.

items.content:
People need to understand precious metals are in the final months/year of a 26 year bull market. This is the "bubble" phase. 

The very beginning and very end of a bull market are where the largest gains are made the quickest. 

So resist the temptation to buy into the narrative.

items.content:
While it is quite extended and vulnerable to a pullback (in the short-term), shorting a strong uptrend is a low probability, high risk bet. 

It's much better to short assets that have already started to top and roll over.
